title: Phase 1: Add OTEL dependencies and update feature flags in Cargo.toml
description: Update Cargo.toml with new OpenTelemetry dependencies and feature flags. Keep old openai/langfuse features temporarily for backward compatibility during transition.
acceptance_criteria: OTEL dependencies added (opentelemetry 0.28, opentelemetry_sdk 0.28, opentelemetry-otlp 0.28, tracing-opentelemetry 0.29, tracing-subscriber 0.3)
Feature flags updated: openrouter, telemetry, updated qdrant feature
Old openai and langfuse features preserved for Phase 6
Full feature includes all new features
